title: (25140) Arbeca -

title: (25250) Bellpuig - 2 LV-3344
description: Service area with manual washing point for large vehicles, ideal for motorhomes.

name: Àrea d’autocaravanes de Vallverd
title: (25261) Àrea d’autocaravanes de Vallverd
description: There are two large trees and a picnic table. Quiet and perfect to spend a night. Free water service.

title: (25250) Bellpuig - 36 Carrer la Font

title: (25140) Arbeca - Unnamed Road
description: Nice agricultural family farm, with vineyards, where they allow overnight, water supply and emptying of gray and black. Beautiful place, and both Maria José the owner and Xabier were super friendly at all times. I wish that those of us who visit the place live up to it. The products for sale in the store give off the same good feeling of affection as their creators. Long life for VINYA ELS VILARS

title: (25250) Bellpuig - 35 Carreró del Call
description: The parking lot is on the street, the special thing is the “Bar Restaurant com a casa” restaurant. The best food I have ever eaten in Spain. It looks inconspicuous but the chef and his wife are so nice and the food is excellent. We had a baguette (very big) and tapas bravas and tapas champions and it was so good! Really awesome! The carrot cake was also the best we've ever had! And all at an unbeatable price!

title: (25250) Bellpuig - Camí del Molí

description: Located in the town of Omellons, enjoy the best views of the town, where you will find the services of a bakery, bar, grocery store and sports institutions with a saltwater pool in summer. Parking and overnight between olive trees, almond trees and aromatic herbs that make this territory ideal for practicing road, mountain and hiking biking, discovering paths and trails between dry stone huts typical of the area or discovering our farmers and livestock. Welcome to Omellons.

title: (25195) Alcoletge - E-25
description: Arrived late after struggling to find somewhere suitable. Spent the night parked up with lorrys- no problems!

title: (25335) Penelles - s/n Plaça del Roser
description: Parking for visiting the city and for sleeping, very quiet, fountain, picnic area with grill. Right next to it is a bar with little things to eat. Additional info: In the village there is a free overnight parking lot without VE, if everything is full here.

title: (25331) Tornabous - 12 Carrer Ronda del Nord
description: Parking of the Parc del Reguer, a park with grass, picnic tables and great playgrounds next to the Reguer stream. By bike or walking from there, there are less than 2 km to the Iberian town Molí del Espígol, very cool to see, on a path full of pear trees. Nearby, if you look out over the Agramunt road, you will see a huge tree among the pear trees, on the left side, it is the banana tree declared by the Generalitat as monumental of Tornabousde, 4 m in diameter from its trail. It is also mandatory to go to the social bar of the old cinema that still works, being one of the 43 that are open in Spain with a theater. In homage to his 75th birthday at C 53 you will see the mural and next to it, recommended fruit from km0.

title_short: (25690) Vilanova de la Barca - 1 Carrer la Font

title: (25670) Térmens - Unnamed Road
description: L'Horta de Baix on the Riu Segre Drive in the village of Termens to the bridge on the Riu Segre. Turn right before the bridge and drive along the river.

title: (25320) Anglesola - 8 Carrer Esports

Lively town with bars, shops and good bakery patisseries. Nice church square with vestiges of the castle. And many routes on foot or mountain bike. The route through the 4 Peixeres, typical pools of L Urgell, along the Ondara river is signposted. Museo del Carro and Cal Gassol museum.

title: (25320) Anglesola - 8 Carrer Esports
description: Municipal swimming pool of Anglesola. Very shaded, next to the pool

title: (25331) La Guàrdia - 35 Avinguda Urgell

title: (25600) Balaguer - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of the church of Santa Maria de las Franqueses. A place without services, but secluded, quiet and in the middle of the orchard area that surrounds Balaguer (3 km). Santa Maria de las Franqueses is an old monastery for women of the Cistercian order built in 1186. Enjoy your stay, but above all, take care and respect the area and the environment.

title: (25410) L'Espluga Calba - 1F Avinguda de Catalunya

The slope of the tower is spectacular, especially if you look at it from the town hall or from the road, when you approach it loses the spectacularity of the slope.

title: (25137) Corbins - 6 Plaça de la Carnisseria

title: (25600) Balaguer - 35 Carrer de Pere III
description: Park in the city center of Balaguer, with a lot of space and grass, nearby the river Segre. No services, but a good place to stay, visyt the historic center or rest.

title: (25616) Montgai - 12 Carrer del Calvari
description: Himalaya is a cozy area for campers located in the province of Lérida, it has beautiful facilities which consist of a terrace with views, a place accommodated for its visitors and parking for your vehicle which is allowed a maximum length of 6 meters, it also has services such as water, electricity and gas at no additional cost. And the most fun thing is that in the facilities there is a 4-walled recodrome with a gym, activities and showers! The price of accommodation is €5 per night. It should be noted that bike carrier services are offered. We hope to see you soon here camper. Regards, we add that in the summer facilities of the rocòdrom they are cool since the walls are made of 35, 40 cm stone, we will try to ensure that they are well cared for, thank you campers. On the weekend of August 18, 19, 20 in the Himalayas, the following activities will be carried out, indicated on the poster in the image gallery of our welcoming profile. To go to the facilities that weekend, it is necessary to register in advance by calling or contacting through Instagram

title: (25300) Tàrrega - 96 Avinguda de Catalunya
description: Laundry with 1 washing machine of 8 kg and 3 of 17 kg, and 2 dryers. 5 minutes from the city center and with a supermarket and bazaars around. You can pay only with bills and coins.

title: (25341) Ciutadilla -
description: Small car park surrounded by fields, space for 2 motorhomes or 3 / 4vans. Possibility of continuing the path and finding other places to park. We stayed here for 2 nights with no problems. A few hunters, quite a lot of rubbish and cartridges but very calm, rather flat and shaded. No service

title: (25331) Agramunt - 6 LV-3231

description: The bugaderia laundromat, both wifi, 3 tenants of different sizes and 2 large dryers.

title: (25300) Tàrrega - Avinguda de la Canaleta

title: (25300) Tàrrega - Carrer de Joan Tous

title: (25300) Tàrrega - 7 Carrer del Segle XX

From here it is possible to go down to the center.

title: (25600) Balaguer - Carrer Pla d'Almata

Parking

Small village with a bar where is possible to eat the best bbq meat.

title: (25340) Verdú - 367 Partida Planes
description:
Font de Santa Magdalena, Verdú herriaren ondoan. Mahasti artean, aintzinako harrizko mahai batzuk ba daude baina ez oso erabilgarriak, nahiz eta xarma eduki. Bear lasaia izan behar du nahiz eta niri stop bat "lagun" suertatu (goizaldean parrandazale gazteak eta goizean ehiztari batzuk). Bestela bear gomendagarria. Bertoko batek ur hau edatea gomendagarria ez omen dala dioste.

Very quiet shady site. Lots of mosquitoes and flies. There is no source.

04/02/2023 It is quite neglected, but for a quiet night it is worth it. You can hear the bell tower the quarters, half, three quarters and the hours, for us it was not a problem, in the end we slept well.

title: (25300) Tàrrega - 44 Carrer de Pere Calders
description: Free parking with shadows and plane. Behind the municipal pool. To go to the pool you can stop inside the complex. Children under 12 years 2 euros the rest 3.5. You can eat menu at the pool 12 euros (it was good). Large pools, hot showers and quiet parking. A good stop for summer.

title: (25353) Claravalls - 16 Carrer de les Escoles
description: Parking in front of the pools, open from mid-June to the end of August, quiet place, easily accessible, without services, near Tárrega.

title_short: (25300) Tàrrega - 1 Carrer Manuel Carrasco i Formiguera

title_short: (25411) Fulleda - 17 Avinguda d'Agustina Saragossa i Domènech

48 hours maximum.

title: (25341) Ciutadilla - 51 Carrer Sant Roc

very calm.

description: Very quiet parking

description: Free parking in front of the sports hall in Gerb. Flat, gravel course, 2 minute walk into the village. Free WiFi (Wifi Gerb), streaming works very well. Very quiet, shadeless place.

title: (25005) Lleida - 137 Partida Balafia
description: Quiet and little-frequented gravel wasteland. In summer there are municipal swimming pools. Poor light. Sometimes there are long-term motorhomes parked

title: (25004) Lleida - 1 Plaça Hispanoamèrica
description: Seu Vella car park. Accessible free of charge during the day, ideal for visiting the castle and the Seu Vella as well as the surrounding streets. Please note: accessible only to vehicles less than 2m wide (passage under a narrow arch to access the car park). Passes without problem with a van or car.

title_short: (25460) Cervià de les Garrigues - Vall del Verger
description: Big parking area with toilet and water up at the church. plenty of space.

title: (25440) Vinaixa - 92A Carretera de Lleida
description: Free rest area for AC and vans. 16 places with electricity and water but you can park much more. As soon as you enter the town, you will see the signs. It is a quiet place, with electricity, water, gray and black water evacuation. Next to it there is a picnic area with tables and barbecues. There is a free tennis court and racquetball court. In summer, there is the municipal swimming pool with a bar, WC and showers. There is also a park for the little ones. In the town there is a bakery, a butcher and to buy a little of everything, a bar and an ATM. From the same town there are different hiking or mountain biking routes through the protected area of "La Vall de Vinaixa" that can be downloaded through Wikiloc on the profile (Associació esportiva Vinaixa), on the information panels or by requesting information directly from the City Council.

title: (25005) Lleida - 91 Carrer de les Corts Catalanes
title_short: (25005) Lleida - 91 Carrer de les Corts Catalanes
description: LAVANDA self-service laundry, near market parking or there is also usually parking in the streets around.

title: (25450) L'Albi - 13 Avinguda de les Garrigues
description:
Free seating area for AC or vans. Direct access AP2 exit 8, 3km from the N240. Pleasant setting in a pine forest with picnic tables and barbecue area. Fountain with drinking water and area for motorhome supplies: electricity connection, wi-fi, water and discharge of gray and black water. Ideal in summer next to the municipal swimming pool with WC, showers and bar. Close to sports area with paddle tennis courts. Maximum time in area with light 72 hours.
Local product stores: bakery, grocery stores, various product stores, bar, restaurant, pharmacy, doctor's office, hairdressers, tobacconist, etc. In the town they also have access to several ATMs, mechanical workshops, car wash... There are also parks for the little ones.

title: (25008) Lleida - 7 Carrer Folch i Torres

title: (25318) Les Puelles - 11 Diseminado les Puelles

title: (25135) La Portella - Unnamed Road
description: Parque del Río Noguera Ribagorzana, an oasis in the middle of the hot plain. It is not a total 4X4 area, it can be accessed even with cars, but I do not recommend it for large volume motorhomes. Very quiet place, in summer it is better to bring protection for mosquitoes.

Beautiful town with beautiful panoramic views and castle with guided tours on Sunday mornings and they make scapes rooms for people over 10 years old, very good plan! There is also the path through the Sierra de Montclar with the Canal de L Urgell mine as a curiosity.

title: (25198) Lleida - Carretera de Tarragona
description: Picnic area without table, with barbecues and shade, far from Lleida, I only stopped several times to eat and take a nap, so as not to spend the night. I did not see any prohibition signs. There are always enough people to picnic.
